doc.field: Subseries IV.F contains records pertaining to the Community Impact functions of WSF, including grant-making programs, student athlete programs, and professional athlete programs. Particular programs and services documented include the Coaches Advisory Roundtable (often shortened to CAR), athlete Travel and Training Grants, GoGirlGo grants, the Athlete Ambassador Program, the Athlete's Speaker Service, and various awards granted by WSF. Record types include grantee applications and winner records, correspondence, budget forms, publicity materials, and program guides, called "playbooks," for staff. This subseries also contains an alphabetical run of subject files for athletes and coaches considered for and inducted into the International Women's Hall of Fame. Records date from 1983-2008.
Series IV. Departmental records >> Subseries IV.F. Community impact records
